name: Star Group, L.P.
description: Star Group, L.P. is a leading provider of residential and commercial heating oil and propane services in the northeastern United States. Established in 1995, the company has grown through strategic acquisitions and organic growth, serving over 300,000 customers across its operating regions. Star Group specializes in delivering high-quality heating oil and propane, as well as providing maintenance and repair services for heating systems, air conditioning units, and water heaters. With a strong commitment to customer satisfaction, Star Group offers various programs, including budget payment plans and automatic delivery services, ensuring that customers have reliable access to heating fuel throughout the year. The company's operations are supported by a dedicated workforce that prioritizes safety, efficiency, and environmental responsibility. In addition to its core heating oil and propane services, Star Group is also expanding its footprint in the renewable energy sector, exploring opportunities in biofuels and energy-efficient technologies. The company aims to provide sustainable energy solutions while maintaining its legacy as a trusted fuel provider. With a focus on innovation and customer service, Star Group continues to position itself as a versatile leader in the energy industry.

seo.meta_title: Star Group, L.P. | Leading Heating Oil and Propane Provider
seo.meta_description: Explore Star Group, L.P., a top provider of heating oil and propane services in the northeastern US. Learn about our commitment to customer satisfaction and renewable energy solutions.

faq.question: What services does Star Group provide?
faq.answer: Star Group provides heating oil, propane delivery, and maintenance services for heating systems, air conditioning, and water heaters.

faq.question: Where is Star Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Star Group is headquartered in Plymouth Meeting, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Star Group?
faq.answer: James M. McNulty is the CEO of Star Group, L.P.

faq.question: Does Star Group offer renewable energy solutions?
faq.answer: Yes, Star Group is exploring opportunities in renewable energy and biofuels.
